amendment.description: To save at least $5 billion by consolidating some duplicative and overlapping government programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 273 proposed by Senator Landrieu for Senator Coburn.

vote.text: Amendment SA 273, under the order of 4/5/2011, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, the amendment was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 64 - 36. Record Vote Number: 57.
